description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Product List Screen and Product Detail Screen of EC-CUBE 4.0.0 to 4.0.6-p2, EC-CUBE 4.1.0 to 4.1.2-p1, and EC-CUBE 4.2.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: EC-CUBE 4.0.0 to 4.0.6-p2, EC-CUBE 4.1.0 to 4.1.2-p1, and EC-CUBE 4.2.0
